readabilityScore.originalText: Readability (legibility) is a feature of the text that represents ease of its perception by the reader, ...

summarized.originalText: Readability (legibility) is a feature of the text that represents ease of its perception by the reader, ...
summary: The two main factors of readability are the printing and linguistic features of the text.
The Flesch Kinkaid Score is the most popular way to measure the readability of English text.
It works on the principle of 'the fewer words in the text, and the fewer syllables in them, the easier it is to perceive'.

highlight: The two main factors of readability are the printing and linguistic features of the text.
In other words, pages containing simple and clear text get higher positions in the search results.
